titleStmt.title: A sermon preached before the antient company of Black-smiths in S. Marie Magdalens Church in London on Saint Iohn Baptist day last. 1611. By William Holbrook
titleStmt.author: Holbrooke, William.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E. A[llde] for Nathaniell Butter, dwelling at S. Austins gate in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A sermon preached before the Black-Smiths.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: S. Austins gate in Pauls Church-yard
